add_library(
	imgui
	imgui.cpp
	imgui.h
	imgui_internal.h
	imconfig.h
	cimgui.cpp
	cimgui.h
	imgui_demo.cpp
	imgui_draw.cpp
	imgui_impl_sdl.cpp
	imgui_impl_sdl.h
	imgui_impl_vulkan.cpp
	imgui_impl_vulkan.h
	imgui_widgets.cpp
	imstb_rectpack.h
	imstb_textedit.h
	imstb_truetype.h)

target_link_libraries(
	imgui
	PUBLIC
	${Vulkan_LIBRARIES} 
	${SDL2_LIBRARIES})

target_include_directories(
	imgui
	PUBLIC
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
	${Vulkan_INCLUDE_DIRS})

if(MSVC)
	target_compile_options(
		imgui
		PRIVATE
		/wd4190)
else()
	target_compile_options(
		imgui
		PRIVATE
		-Wno-return-type-c-linkage)
endif()
